fixed: Fixed trivia not accepting the answer in uppaer & mixed cases.
improved: `giveaway` command is now accessible by server administrators and they can give away anything they want. Go ahead and give away amazing goodies to your server members.
You can now see the IDs of server members in the `leaderboard` command.
added: Howdy gamers! Use the new `fortnite` command to get Fortnite game stats of any player, in any platform.
Bot owners can now give away Bastion Currencies using the `currencyGiveaway` command.
